author: courant.com
title: Photo gallery: First Democratic presidential debate
text:
Caption Sanders and Clinton Joe Raedle / Getty Images Democratic presidential candidates Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., and Hillary Clinton shake hands Oct. 13, 2015, during the first Democratic presidential debate in Las Vegas.
Democratic presidential candidates Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., and Hillary Clinton shake hands Oct. 13, 2015, during the first Democratic presidential debate in Las Vegas.
(Joe Raedle / Getty Images) Hillary Rodham Clinton John Locher / AP Hillary Rodham Clinton smiles during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas.
Hillary Rodham Clinton smiles during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas.
(John Locher / AP) See more galleries Photo gallery: First Democratic presidential debate
This photo gallery is featured in these articles: Home O'Malley a hot topic on social media during debate Nation & World Bernie Sanders' night: Authenticity wins the Democratic debate Nation & World 5 takeaways from the Democratic debate
